text:
e="preserve">HiT Entertainment is a British TV entertainment company owned by Mattel. They have TV characters such as Angelina Ballerina, Barney & Friends, Bob the Builder, Fifi and the Flowertots, Mopatop's Shop, Roary the Racing Car, Fireman Sam, Fraggle Rock, Kipper the Dog, Pingu, Rainbow Magic and Thomas & Friends. Hit Movies is a division of Hit Entertainment. They have movies for the whole family to enjoy, such as film franchises based on Thomas & Friends, Bob the Builder, Roary the Racing Car, Mopatop's Shop, Barney & Friends, Yoko! Jakamoko! Toto!, Fireman Sam, Fifi and the Flowertots, and new characters and stories.
Hit Entertainment was founded in 1980. It has headquarters in London, United Kingdom.
